summary.para: An Object Space which is used for data manipulation via the Entity Framework.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.#ctor(DevExpress.ExpressApp.DC.ITypesInfo,DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFTypeInfoSource,DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.CreateObjectContextHandler)

summary.para: Creates a new instance of the EFObjectSpace class.

member.param: An object providing access to XAF-related information on business classes.
An EFTypeInfoSource object that provides information on business classes related to the Entity Framework.
A CreateObjectContextHandler object that is a delegate encapsulating a method for creating an ObjectContext for the current Object Space.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.#ctor(DevExpress.ExpressApp.DC.ITypesInfo,DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFTypeInfoSource,DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.CreateObjectContextHandler,DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.UpdateSchemaHandler)

summary.para: Creates a new instance of the EFObjectSpace class.

member.param: An object providing access to XAF-related information on business classes.
An EFTypeInfoSource object that provides Entity Framework - related information on business classes.
A CreateObjectContextHandler object that is a delegate encapsulating a method for creating an ObjectContext for the current Object Space.
A UpdateSchemaHandler object that is a delegate encapsulating a method for updating schema.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.AllowUpdateSchema

summary.para: Indicates whether or not a schema update is allowed.

member.value: false, when the UpdateSchemaHandler object passed to the EFObjectSpace constructor is not null; otherwise - true.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.ApplyCriteria(System.Object,DevExpress.Data.Filtering.CriteriaOperator)

summary.para: Filters the specified collection according to the specified criteria on the server side.

member.param: An Object that is the collection to be filtered.
A DevExpress.Data.Filtering.CriteriaOperator object that specifies the criteria used to filter objects on the server side.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.ApplyFilter(System.Object,DevExpress.Data.Filtering.CriteriaOperator)

summary.para: Filters a particular collection on the client side.

member.param: A collection to be filtered.
A DevExpress.Data.Filtering.CriteriaOperator object that specifies the criteria used to filter objects.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.CanApplyCriteria(System.Type)

summary.para: Indicates whether collections of a particular type can be filtered on the server side.

member.param: A object specifying the type of collections whose server-side filtering capability must be determined.
member.returns: true, if collections of the specified type can be filtered on the server side; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.CanApplyFilter(System.Object)

summary.para: Indicates whether a particular collection can be filtered on the client side.

member.param: A collection that is tested on whether it can be filtered.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.CanInstantiate(System.Type)

summary.para: Indicates whether instances of a particular type can be created.

member.param: An object type for which it must be determined whether its instances can be created.
member.returns: true, if instances of the specified type can be created; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.Connection

summary.para: Gets the connection to the underlying data source.

member.value: An IDbConnection object that is the connection to the underlying data source.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.Contains(System.Object)

summary.para: Indicates whether a specified object belongs to the current Object Space.

member.param: A persistent object to be tested.
member.returns: true if the specified persistent object belongs to the current Object Space; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.CreateNestedObjectSpace

summary.para: Creates a nested Object Space.

member.returns: An IObjectSpace object which is supposed to be created.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.CreateParseCriteriaScope

summary.para: Used when parsing a CriteriaOperator represented by a string and containing persistent objects.

member.returns: An IDisposable object used to restore persistent objects from a serialized string.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.CreateServerCollection(System.Type,DevExpress.Data.Filtering.CriteriaOperator)

summary.para: Creates and initializes a new instance of the EFServerCollection class with criteria-specific options.

member.param: The type of persistent objects to include into the collection.
The DevExpress.Data.Filtering.CriteriaOperator that specifies the criteria for object selection in a data store.
member.returns: A server collection that includes the persistent objects of the specified type. In addition, only objects that satisfy the specified criteria will be retrieved to this collection.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.Database

summary.para: Gets the name of the database used when a connection associated with the current Object Space's is opened.

member.value: A string that is the name of the database used when a connection is opened.

summary.para: Releases all resources used by an EFObjectSpace object.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.EnableObjectDeletionOnRemove(System.Object,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Enables/disables the deletion of persistent objects from the data source when they are removed from the specified collection.

member.param: A collection of persistent objects that are requested to be removed from the database along with their removal from the collection.
true, to enable the object deletion from the database along with their removal from the collection; false, to disable it.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.FindObject(System.Type,DevExpress.Data.Filtering.CriteriaOperator,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Searches for the first object which matches the specified criteria.

member.param: A object which is the type of objects to search for.
A DevExpress.Data.Filtering.CriteriaOperator descendant which is the criteria for matching persistent objects.
A boolean value. It is not used during the search.
member.returns: An object which is the first persistent object which matches the specified criteria. null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if there is no persistent object which matches the criteria.

member.value: true, if the is connected to the database; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.IsDeletionDefferedType(System.Type)

summary.para: Indicates whether the specified type supports the Deferred Deletion mode.

member.param: A type to be tested.
member.returns: true if the type specified as the type parameter supports the Deferred Deletion mode; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.IsDisposedObject(System.Object)

summary.para: Determines whether an object has been disposed of.

member.param: An object to test.
member.returns: true, if the specified object has been disposed of; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.IsNewObject(System.Object)

summary.para: Indicates whether a specified object has been created but has not been saved to the database.

member.param: An object to be tested.
member.returns: true if the specified object has not been yet saved to the database; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.IsObjectDeletionOnRemoveEnabled(System.Object)

summary.para: Indicates whether the deletion of persistent objects from the data source when they are removed from the specified collection is enabled.

member.param: A collection of persistent objects that are requested to be removed from the database along with their removal from the collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.IsObjectToDelete(System.Object)

summary.para: Indicates whether the specified object has been deleted but not committed in the current object context.

member.param: The persistent object to test.
member.returns: true, if the specified object is marked as deleted and should be committed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.IsObjectToSave(System.Object)

summary.para: Indicates whether the specified object has been added, deleted or modified, but not committed in the current object context.

member.param: An object for which it is requested whether it should be saved.
member.returns: true if the specified object has been added, deleted or modified and should be committed; false if the object has not been modified since the last commit.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.ModifiedObjects

summary.para: Returns a collection of objects that have been created, modified or deleted in the current object context.

member.value: An IList collection of persistent objects that are added, deleted or modified in the transaction currently in progress.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.ObjectContext

summary.para: Provides access to an Object Context that is used to work with entry data as persistent objects.

member.value: A System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext object which is used by the current Object Space to work with entry data as persistent objects.

summary.para: Occurs when entities are added to or removed from the state manager.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.ParseCriteria(System.String)

summary.para: Tries to convert the specified string representation of an expression to its CriteriaOperator equivalent.

member.returns: A CriteriaOperator equivalent of the expression contained in criteria.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.ReloadCollection(System.Object)

member.param: An Object that is the collection to be reloaded.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.ReloadObject(System.Object)

summary.para: Updates the specified object in the current Object Space's with data from the data source.

member.param: An object which represents the persistent object whose state needs to be reloaded.
member.returns: The object specified by the obj parameter after it has been reloaded.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.RemoveFromModifiedObjects(System.Object)

summary.para: Removes the specified object from the object context and then attaches it again, to remove all the tracked changes that have not been committed.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.EF.EFObjectSpace.SetTopReturnedObjectsCount(System.Object,System.Int32)

summary.para: Sets the maximum number of objects that can be retrieved by the specified collection from a data store.

member.param: A collection that is the subject for determining the number of objects that can be retrieved by it.
An integer value specifying the maximum number of objects that can be retrieved by the specified collection from the database. 0 indicates that all objects will be retrieved.
